nodes.text: Anglu was an orange-skinned, female Twi'lek who operated as a swoop pilot for the Hidden Beks on Taris in 3956 BBY. She rivaled Redros in the swoop racing championship that Revan eventually won prior to the planet's destruction.
If Revan sides with the Black Vulkars she ends up beating Revan's first heat, however, on his second run Revan manages to beat her time.
